Ensuring every child in Allegan County is safe, healthy, and eager

div.class: cff-item cff-link-item cff-box cff-shadow author-hopkins-public-schools cff-Hpsvikings cff-new

div.span: HPS McKinney Vento Resources Use the following resources if you are experiencing financial hardships due to the COVID-19 pandemic or...

div.class: cff-item cff-link-item cff-box cff-shadow author-hopkins-elementary-school cff-HopkinsElementary cff-new

p.span:
If you have children at home ages 0-6, we encourage you to follow the Help Me Grow Allegan FB page. There will be activities for your young kiddos posted daily on this page, some even from our HPS Family Coach, Nicole Nylaan. There are even opportunities for you to win some free books -- check it out!
Help Me Grow Allegan
And if you need some age specific learning activities to be sent directly to your email address, or even if you need printed materials sent directly to your home, visit this link and complete the simple form.
www.helpmegrow-mi.org/request

div.span:
Ensuring every child in Allegan County is safe, healthy, and eager
to succeed in school and in life.

div.class: cff-item cff-status-post cff-box cff-shadow author-hopkins-middle-school cff-HopkinsMiddleSchool cff-new

p.span:
Good morning!
If your student is receiving e-mails about returning overdue books, please disregard them. Hold on to the books and return them when we come back to school in the fall.
Thank you!
Mrs. Schoonveld🙂

div.p: Thanks. Can you just confirm whether or not we are supposed to hang on to our netbooks until fall also???

div.class: cff-item cff-photo-post cff-box cff-shadow author-sycamore-elementary-school cff-SycamoreVikings cff-new

p.span:
Student belongings/material pickup day!
Monday, April 20th 8-11 or noon-3.
Or tomorrow, Tuesday, April21st 9-noon.

img.alt: Student belongings/material pickup day! Monday, April 20th 8-11 or noon-3. Or tomorrow, Tuesday, April21st 9-noon.

div.p: This was SO well run and organized!! Thank you everyone for all the work that you put into this <3
Thank you everyone stay healthy and safe! We miss you!

div.class: cff-item cff-link-item cff-box cff-shadow author-hopkins-elementary-school cff-HopkinsElementary cff-new

div.p: FREE learning activities sent directly to your home!!!! Awesome!

div.class: cff-item cff-link-item cff-box cff-shadow author-hopkins-middle-school cff-HopkinsMiddleSchool cff-new

div.span: From Mr. Stockwell Hello Hopkins Students and Parents, I wanted to send a quick reminder that our Distance Learning Plan begins for all...

div.p:
Is there any plan in place for netbook /chrome book issues? Who is the contact person for repairs or exchanges?
I have a desk top and iPad for a backup but maybe other families are not as fortunate.
Thank you to all HPS staff

div.class: cff-item cff-photo-post cff-box cff-shadow author-sycamore-elementary-school cff-SycamoreVikings cff-new

p.span: Just a few upper elementary items. Mostly 4th grade. Any takers? Let me know before Monday and I’ll put it with their belongings.

img.alt: Just a few upper elementary items. Mostly 4th grade. Any takers? Let me know before Monday and I’ll put it with their belongings.

div.p: I think the purple fuzzy glove is Brooklyn VanWagner’s but I can’t find it’s mate now either to be sure 🤦🏼‍♀️🤷🏼‍♀️
Tiffany Jablonski are those Nick's Filas? I asked Braeden because he has the same pair, his are here at home, so he thinks they're Nick's.

div.class: cff-item cff-link-item cff-box cff-shadow author-hopkins-high-school cff-HopkinsHighSchool cff-new

p.span: Middle School and High School Students and Parents- If you need to pick up locker room items, band instruments, or you missed the opportunity to grab the contents of your lockers, there is an opportunity next week Monday and Tuesday to do so. Please see the link for details. bit.ly/hpscleanout

p.a: Grades 6-12 Academic Lockers, Gym Lockers (HS only) and Band Instruments

div.class: cff-item cff-link-item cff-box cff-shadow author-hopkins-high-school cff-HopkinsHighSchool cff-new

p.span:
Day Twenty Three: April 15
COVID 19 - Hopkins High School Update
We have just sent out an email to every student launching our Remote Learning Plan. The plan is found under District COVID-19 News and Information tab on our district’s homepage.
www.hpsvikings.org/our-district/district-covid-19-information/
Please review this information. School work for the week of 4/20-4/24 will be shared on Thursday 4/16. We look forward to getting back to the responsibility of education. No plan is perfect but we do feel we will keep our students educationally safe with this plan. Your participation and collaboration will be paramount for our collective success.
We look forward to serving the needs of students and the community.
Yours in Education
Ken Szczepanski, Principal

p.a: District COVID-19 Information - Hopkins Public Schools
